dict.acceptation: 批评家；评论员；批评者；挑剔的人；

sent.orig: Someone once tabbed me the critic's critic.
sent.trans: 有人曾经称我为批评家的批评家。

sent.orig: The critic should acknowledge the complexity and inherent ambiguity of the policymaker's choices.
sent.trans: 评论者应该承认决策者作出抉择的复杂性及难以避免的缺乏鲜明性。

sent.orig: A literary critic should not be too subjective in his approach.
sent.trans: 文学评论家的看法不应太主观。

sent.orig: Maybe only a critic will develop cynical fatigue at all, as the optimism marches on.
sent.trans: 或许，随着乐观情绪稳步高涨，只有批评家会出现愤世嫉俗的疲劳。

sent.orig: He was not satisfied with the drama critic panning his new play.
sent.trans: 他不满于这位戏剧批评家对自己新剧本的苛评。
